channel.title: Dessert on Food Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dessert on Food Blog

item.title: Apple Tarts
item.description: > Click to read fluff < This will be hidden from the user unless a button is clicked. Ingredients (8-10 tarts) For the puff pastry: 250g flour (or 2 cups and 1 heaped tablespoon) 250g butter (or 1 cup and 1 tablespoon) 1-1.5dl lukewarm water (or a little over 1/3 cup to a little less than 2/3 cups) 3g salt (0.11oz) For the pastry cream: 38g flour (or 1/3 cup) 100g sugar (or 1/2 cup) 250ml milk (or a little over 1 cup) 3 egg yolks 1/2 teaspoon vanilla For the tarts:

item.title: Easter Bread
item.description: Ingredients (2 loaves) 500g flour (or 4 1/4 cups) 100g butter (or 1/2 cup) 15g fresh yeast (or 0.5oz) 3 tablespoons sugar 2 small eggs 2,5dl milk (plus a little more to dissolve the yeast) (or 1 cup and 1 tablespoon) 1 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon cinnamon 1 teaspoon fennel seeds chopped or powdered 2 boiled eggs (optional) Instructions (Time: 4 hours) Start by dissolving the yeast in a bit of warm milk.
